unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Spark a Surya Kiran in Indian Homes!**
normalised: **Energy and Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Spark a Surya Kiran in Indian Homes!**

unnormalised: Thinking of going solar, yaar? Good news! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) is still dishing out subsidies for rooftop solar installations. You can save a bundle on your electricity bill, and feel like a true "Swades" hero helping Mother India!
normalised: Thinking of going solar, yaar? Good news! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (M N R E) is still dishing out subsidies for rooftop solar installations. You can save a bundle on your electricity bill, and feel like a true "Swades" hero helping Mother India!

unnormalised: The subsidy amount varies by state, but generally, you're looking at a significant chunk off the installation cost. Think less bijli bill stress and more mithai money!
normalised: The subsidy amount varies by state, but generally, you're looking at a significant chunk off the installation cost. Think less bijli bill stress and more mithai money!

unnormalised: Talking about money, up to Rs. 14,588/kW can be yours in some states. Do check the latest guidelines on MNRE's website though, things change faster than dialogues in a Bollywood film.
normalised: Talking about money, up to rupee fourteen thousand five hundred and eighty eight per kilowatt can be yours in some states. Do check the latest guidelines on M N R E's website though, things change faster than dialogues in a Bollywood film.

unnormalised: The Indian Renewable Energy Development Agency (IREDA) is also involved, providing easier financing options for these projects. So, going green is now easier than convincing your Sharmaji neighbour to switch from his ancient AC.
normalised: The Indian Renewable Energy Development Agency (I R E D A) is also involved, providing easier financing options for these projects. So, going green is now easier than convincing your Sharmaji neighbour to switch from his ancient A C.

unnormalised: Experts say this is the push needed to reach the 40 GW rooftop solar target by 2024. Go for it and be the shining 'Surya' in your society!
normalised: Experts say this is the push needed to reach the forty gigawatt rooftop solar target by two thousand and twenty four. Go for it and be the shining 'Surya' in your society!
